metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000017 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4 and 4.6 are vulnerable to a weakness where a user with appropriate permissions is able to connect to an arbitrary MySQL server

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000017` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.6-5
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> The vulnerability is exposed only to MySQL superusers.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5').
